Name: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
About the game: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematic question solving, running, and jumping, shooting, and ducking Mathemies (math enemies). Additional features are two mini Arcade Game rooms with added fun, when you collect a certain number of Red Yet cogs. For ages 8 and up. Gameplay: 100% Keyboard controlled game - gameplay controls shown during gameplay. Purchase Includes: 1 - .exe game file 2 - free download of DLC that will be available May 15th, 2022 [update] A RED YET Game / Inspired by Billy Minter & Dr√© Damion / Designed by Tazzz Web Designs Please note: for every sale, 20% goes towards a child in need.
